attributes.action: get rid of car tax, pay as you use on fuel
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Being a classic car owner i am fed up with taxing my car and it just sitting there. I am sure there are many people in the same boat!!! Why cant we have a disc on the front windscreen for mot and in insurance (just like europe!!!) and pay extra on fuel, Even though we pay enough, This country has gone mad with all the extra taxes we have to pay, Cut taxes some people might actually keep there houses.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
